articles.description: A team of researchers at the University of Oslo has found evidence that shows Earth's heat loss is more pronounced on one side of the planet than the other. In their paper published in the journal Geophysical Research Letters, the group describes creating mod…

articles.title: Younger Mainers account for rising number of COVID-19 cases - Press Herald
articles.description: A modest but steady uptick in cases over the last few weeks appears to be driven in part by Mainers in their 20s and younger.
